name: Enclave
description: The linux version is a WIndows version with a old wIne version no longer maintened. In this case they are advantage to use directly the wIndows version, you could choose the WIne version and others options in Lutris.
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the GOG setup exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Enclave/Enclave.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing Syberia
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
